reviews.review_msg: This class was great. I dont understand why people complain about hard classes. Its 3rd year. Get used to it. Interesting topic but ya, study for M/T and final and you'll do fine. University is NOT highschool people! Definitely recommend 316!

320 is simply not a fun class to take or teach. Patrick is a good prof with lots of research experience. The downside was that he did not post slides which resulted in a tonne of note writing. The tutorials were essential in order to understand SPSS and the assignments. The research proposal wasn't too bad, but the final was tough to say the least.
Course was very interesting at times.  M/T was very hard.  Overall would recommend if you your willing to study and put a lot of time into the weekly 2 page papers.
Difficult class. Do not take it if you want to boost your grade.

exams are hard. average was very low for MT. Course content is interesting but his lectures are boring and confusing at times. LOTS of writing in this course. But he is occasionally funny and he doesnt mind helping students

It's a shame he gets bad ratings b/c of a bad course.  Yes the course is stats and its not fun. But he is a very smart man and a very funny guy as well!  To the person below:  if you are writing everything on each slide, that's a problem.  You need to be able to pick out the key points on each slide that's the trick! Overall, a good prof!
This class seemed easy but the m.t and final was brutal. Very confusing things at time. Class was interesting but this class is definietly not a gpa booster. Beware
I don't know why everyone says Lussier is hot...he's not, and does that really matter? He is an okay prof but a bit confusing at times

reality is its crim320.. no one wants to teach it. Test are straight forward and fair, midterm is straight out of the book.. for the final i highly recommend both you and your partners do the SPSS interpretations of the findings for your assignments. since 75% of the final is just doing that. its stats... lectures notes i recommended laptop. GL

He was approachable if you talked to him after class. Expectations are really high for undergrades. He never posted his notes so if you missed the class then you missed the notes. He is Hot, he was nice to look at for sure, very smart but in life your looks don't make you a good teacher!

horrible.just horrible.he's not approachable.he seemed to make an effort NOT to attend his office hours.he doesn't respond to emails!i was so interested special topic, and he totally killed it for me.also, his midterm was unfair,one of the major questions was a trick question("underlying question").he's alright to look at, but save urself the pain

Overall, great prof considering he teaches reseach methods. His midterm was fair, and i must say the final was tedious. I liked how he at least tried to make a class everyone dreads somewhat interesting.
Excellent teacher who tries very hard with somewhat dry material. Makes class interesting.
No Comments
Nice eye candy...but he knows he is hot! As for the class he tried but spent too much time asking questions from an non participating audience. He knows the subject but can't get the point across

Nice enough guy, but lectures were unbearable, considering that its a stats class. I think he tries, but has a hard time getting his point across. However, this class could have been much worse. Exams are not too hard, nor are the assignments. He is willing to help his students.

Totally in agreement that he wastes time, asks many confusing questions and waits forever for someone to give the exact answer he wants. workload is managable though and he has a cute accent and is not bad to look at. Very much aware of his hotness however, and dresses like a gap model...ew.
wouldnt recommend him, looks dont matter when u cant teach. Takes him forever to explain one thing, and he wastes endless amounts of time trying to make students answer questions.
He's amazing to look at, but not that great of a teacher for Stats stuff if you have trouble with anything math-related.  Heard he gives less work than Davies for 320 tho...

Ok...good looking guy but soooo spacey! He spends literally the entire lecture asking us questions and trying to get us to answer them. Just give us the answers and move on! He is pretty cute, but he should try getting through the material rather than rambling forever!
He is very arrogant, and does not attend his own office hours. I will never take a class with him again

Great intentions...but lack of english grammer skills made the class a little challenging. Also, his method of using one empirical study as a case study for the whole semster was difficult to understand until the end of the semester. Some of the concepts were pretty abstract (like conceptualization).

did not read the text book, boombed the term paper, but still managed a B- his exams are extremly easy, he teaches everything in the lec if not the TA will teach in the tut. Bad accent, yes, but totally hot! do not mind staring at him for 2 hrs..*hahaha
Definitely did not like this class at all. AMybe it was the content, maybe it was the prof.
No Comments

Patrick was wonderful~ Look past the accent and he really knows his stuff (especially those sex offenders)! His tests are totally in line with the book and the lectures, and his powerpoint lectures are extremely well organized. I was surprised at how painless he made a research methods course.
He's so hot!!!!

It's true that Lussier isn't the most fluent in English, but I think the fact that he outlines things so clearly on overheads or powerpoint makes up for it. His tests are fair and he does the best he can with the (very dull) class content by pulling in some more interesting outside sources.
No Comments
